SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! TODO: REPLACE CHECK_TYPE_CMD in ITPASHARED ! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME#, '"', '""') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '$', '`$') SET CHECKME=&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# SET ISFILE=0 SET ISDIR=0 SET EXIST=0 if exist "%CHECKME%" ( SET EXIST=1 if exist "%CHECKME%\" ( SET ISDIR=1 ) else ( SET ISFILE=1 ) ) else ( SET EXIST=0 ) :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
